title: The Biggest Artists From Our Home States + Lunchbox Asked Strangers To Rub Sunscreen On Him + Eddie Let His Kids Vote On The CMA's
itunes:title: The Biggest Artists From Our Home States + Lunchbox Asked Strangers To Rub Sunscreen On Him + Eddie Let His Kids Vote On The CMA's
description:
We share what we think are the biggest artists from our home states of Arkansas, Texas, Michigan, Kansas and Florida. Lunchbox was out in Florida on vacation and asked strangers to put lotion on his back. We guess whether they will or not. Eddie reveals that he sought the help of his kids to vote on the CMAs and it’s a bit controversial.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
